New Records: Heinrich Klaasen broke the record for the fastest half-century in a T20 World Cup final
Key Match Events: India won the T20 World Cup for a second time with a seven-run victory
Suryakumar Yadav took a stunning catch to dismiss David Miller
South Africa fell short in their chase needing 177 runs
Pre-Game Insights: India recovered from a shaky start at 34-3 to post a total of 176
South Africa made rapid inroads with early bowling success
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma lifted the ICC Men's T20 Cricket World Cup Trophy
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was the highest T20 international chase on the Kensington Oval
The Proteas' wait for a World Cup win continued
